unit.name: Great Khan
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Light Armour, Sons of the Avalanche

unit.name: Khan
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Scrapling Lookout, Light Armour, Sons of the Avalanche

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Shaman
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Sons of the Avalanche

unit.name: Mammoth Hunter
unit.description: single model, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Animal Master, Light Troops, Loner, Not a Leader, Swiftstride, Light Armour, Sons of the Avalanche

unit.name: Tribesmen
unit.description: 3-13 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Scoring, Scrapling Lookout, Light Armour, Sons of the Avalanche, Paired Weapons

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Bruisers
unit.description: 3-12 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Scoring, Scrapling Lookout, Heavy Armour, Sons of the Avalanche, Great Weapon

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Scraplings
unit.description: 20-60 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Scoring, Back to Work, Light Armour, Throwing Weapons (4+)

unit.name: Sabretooth Tigers (Core)
unit.description: 1-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x50 mm, Insignificant

unit.name: Sabretooth Tigers
unit.description: 1-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x50 mm, Insignificant, More than 7 tigers counts as core (choose in core units)

unit.name: Scrapling Trappers
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Its a Trap, Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Throwing Weapons (5+)

unit.name: Yetis
unit.description: 2-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry Base 40x40 mm, Fear, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Touch of Frost, Vanguard, Paired Weapons

unit.name: Kin-Eater
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Ambush, Fear, Fearless, Unbreakable, Fortitude (5+), Hatred

unit.name: Tusker Cavalry
unit.description: 3-5 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Tusker: Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Mercenary Veterans
unit.description: 3-8* models, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Battle-Scarred, Scoring, Scrapling Lookout, Heavy Armour, Sons of the Avalanche

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Thunder Cannon
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Bombardier Crew: Sons of the Avalanche, Woolly Rhino: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate, Thunder Cannon (4+)

unit.name: Scratapult
unit.description: Single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Insignificant, Swiftstride, Woolly Rhino: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate, Scratapult (4+)

unit.name: Bombardiers
unit.description: 3-8 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Scoring, Scrapling Lookout, Light Armour, Hand Cannon (4+), Sons of the Avalanche

equipment.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky

unit.name: Rock Aurochs
unit.description: single model 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Fearless, Frenzy, Mountain Hide, Rock Aurochs: Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed, Impact Hits (3D3), Living Avalanche

unit.name: Frost Mammoth
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Freezing Aura, Frost Mammoth: Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

unit.name: Slave Giant
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 50x75 mm, Giant See Giant Do, Rage, Big Brother

mount.name: Tusker
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Harnessed, Impact Hits (D3)

mount.name: Rock Aurochs
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Fearless, Frenzy, Mountain Hide, Rock Aurochs: Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed, Impact Hits (3D3), Living Avalanche

item.name: Animal Master
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Commanding Presence, but only units of Sabretooth Tigers may benefit from it.

item.name: Aurochs Charm
item.description: The bearer gains Mountain Hide.

item.name: Back to Work
item.description: Universal Rule. The Scrapling Foreman is a Champion, except it does not benefit from First Among Equals. It gains Rally Around the Flag, but only Scraplings, Scrapling Trappers, and Scratapults may benefit from it.

item.name: Banner of the Gyengget
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core. In the First Round of Combat, natural to-hit, towound, and Armour Save rolls of 1 from all model parts in the bearers unit must be rerolled, including Special Attacks.

item.name: Battle-Scarred
item.description: Each unit of Mercenary Veterans may be given up to two of the upgrades listed below (the upgrades must be written on the Army List). The models gain: - Accurate - Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) - Lethal Strike - Magic Resistance (2) - Plate Armour - Poison Attacks - Swiftstride - Vanguard Each upgrade may only be taken by a single unit of Mercenary Veterans in your army.

item.name: Big Brother
item.description: Universal Rule. The models Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75x100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

item.name: Brace of Ogre Pistols
Brace of Ogre Pistols (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon Range 24", Shots 2, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire. Counts as Paired Weapons in close combat.

item.name: Cult Leader
item.description: General or Battle Standard Bearer only. The range of the bearers Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag is always 18".

item.name: Firebrand
item.description: If the bearer selects one or more spells from Pyromancy, it gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks), Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, and always knows Fireball (Pyromancy) in addition to its other spells. The bearer automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

item.name: Freezing Aura
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can cast Chilling Howl (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). Enemy units within 9" of one or more Frost Mammoths suffer -3 Agility. The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units that Break from Combat while in base contact with one or more Frost Mammoths is subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Giant Club
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Giant See Giant Do
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Sons of the Avalanche and counts as a Character for the purpose of Sons of the Avalanche. The model is a Musician. The range of the models March to the Beat, and to enemy units that are required to take a March Test due to the Slave Giant, are both extended to 18".

item.name: Gut Roarer
item.description: Shamans only. The bearer gains Channel (1) and Fear.

item.name: Hand Cannon
item.description: Shooting Weapon.Range 24", Shots D6, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

item.name: Headhunter
item.description: At the end of any Melee Phase in which attacks made by the bearer have caused one or more enemy models to lose their last Health Point, roll a D6, unless the bearer is Fleeing. On a roll of 3+ the bearers model Recovers a single Health Point.

item.name: Heart-Ripper
item.description: Enchantment: Iron Fist or Paired Weapons. Attacks made with this weapon gain Lethal Strike, +1 Armour Penetration, become Magical Attacks, and can never hit on worse than 3+.

item.name: Hoardmaster
item.description: Great Khans and Khans only. The bearer gains Weapon Master, Plate Armour, Great Weapon, Halberd, Iron Fist, and Paired Weapons. The bearer cannot take Weapon Enchantments.

item.name: Hunting Spear
Hunting Spear (3+)
Hunting Spear (2+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon Range 12", Shots 1, Str as user +1, AP as user +1, Multiple Wounds (D3, against Gigantic), Quick to Fire.

item.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fist (on foot only)
item.description: Close Combat Weapon The wielder gains +1 Armour and +1 Attack Value unless using another weapon. If the wielder is on foot, it also gains Parry. This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments from the List of Common Special Items.

item.name: Its a Trap
item.description: Universal Rule. Each unit of Scrapling Trappers may place a Trap Counter: - Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), on a single Terrain Feature other than Open Terrain that the unit was deployed in or was in contact with at any point during its Vanguard move - Once during each friendly Movement Phase, on a single Terrain Feature other than Open Terrain that the unit was in contact with during an Advance Move, March Move, or a Reform in this phase If an enemy unit performs an Advance Move, March Move, Reform, Pivot, Charge Move, Failed Charge Move, Pursuit Move, or Flee Move inside or into contact with a Terrain Feature with one or more Trap Counters, remove all Trap Counters in that particular Terrain Feature. Each model in the unit must take a Dangerous Terrain (1) Test. These tests are not considered to be caused by the Terrain Feature; any Dangerous Terrain Tests that would normally be caused by the Terrain Feature still need to be taken.

item.name: Karkadans Resilience
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +1 Resilience but automatically fails all Special Saves.

item.name: Khagadais Legacy
item.description: Enchantment: Great Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain Multiple Wounds (D3) and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Leader of the Pack
item.description: The Mammoth Hunters base size is changed to 50x50 mm. As long the model is joined to a unit of Sabretooth Tigers, the unit (including the Mammoth Hunter) gains Swift Reform and Vanguard, and the Mammoth Hunter counts as being a Standard Beast for the purposes of distributing hits, except for Stomp Attacks.

item.name: Living Avalanche
item.description: Attack Attribute. The models Impact Hits gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Loner
item.description: Universal Rule.If on foot, the model can only join units of Yetis and Sabretooth Tigers; ignore the Insignificant rule for joining units. If mounted, it cannot join any unit. A model with Loner cannot join a unit containing any other Characters, and Characters cannot join a unit containing a model with Loner.

item.name: Lygurs Tongue
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer suffer -1 Attack Value.

item.name: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
item.description: Models on foot only. Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour. Attacks against the wearer can never have a Strength above 5.

item.name: Mountain Hide
item.description: When a model with Mountain Hide suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by half, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Ogre Crossbow
Ogre Crossbow (3+)
Ogre Crossbow (2+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon Range 30", Shots 1, Str 2 [5], AP 1 [3], Area Attack (1x5).

item.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky
item.description: The bearers unit gains Swiftstride.

item.name: Rage
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. Whenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it gains a Health Point, it suffers -1 Attack Value.

item.name: Rampagers Chain
item.description: The bearer gains Stomp Attacks (D3+1), and all models in the bearers unit must reroll failed towound rolls with Stomp Attacks.

item.name: Ritual Bloodletter
item.description: Shamans only. Enchantment: Hand Weapon, Iron Fist, or Paired Weapons. The wielder gains +1 Offensive Skill and +1 Attack Value while using this weapon. Attacks made with it become Magical Attacks. For each unsaved wound inflicted with this weapon, the owner gains one Veil Token.

item.name: Rottenjaw
item.description: The bearer gains Poison Attacks, and all friendly Kin- Eater units may reroll Ambush rolls of 1 and 2 while the bearer is on the Battlefield. Unless the bearer is Gigantic, all attacks against it with Poison Attacks lose this Attack Attribute.

item.name: Scrapling Lookout
item.description: If a unit includes a Standard Bearer or a Battle Standard Bearer with Scrapling Lookout, there must be fewer than 3 R&F models before hits can be distributed onto Characters with the same Type and Height as the unit.

item.name: Scratapult
item.description: Catapult (5x5), Range 12-48", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 1, Lethal Strike. A Scratapult that only Pivots (and moves no further) during its owners Movement Phase ignores the to-hit modifier from Moving and Shooting in the next Shooting Phase.

item.name: Skull of Qenghet
item.description: The bearers unit gains Fear and automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

item.name: Sons of the Avalanche
item.description: The model part gains Impact Hits (1). If its unit has 2 or more Full Ranks, the model part gains Impact Hits (2). A Character with Sons of the Avalanche instead gains Impact Hits (D3), or Impact Hits (D3+1) if its unit has 2 or more Full Ranks. In addition, the model is immune to the effects of Fear from enemy models.

item.name: Spinesplitter
item.description: Models on foot only. The bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP). The Strength and Armour Penetration bonuses from Devastating Charge also affect Impact Hits and Stomp Attacks.

item.name: Thunder Cannon
item.description: Artillery Weapon. This Artillery Weapon can be fired in two ways: - Cannon, Range 48", Shots 1, Str 5 [10], AP 2 [10], Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3+1, Clipped Wings)] - Volley Gun, Range 12", Shots 2D6, Str 5, AP 4 A Thunder Cannon that only Pivots (and moves no further) during its owners Movement Phase ignores the to-hit modifier from Moving and Shooting in the next Shooting Phase.

item.name: Touch of Frost
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy units suffer −1 Agility for each unit of Yetis in base contact with them.

item.name: Trolleater
item.description: Models on foot only. The bearer gains Fortitude (4+) and Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Infantry).

item.name: Vipers Curse
item.description: Enchantment: Brace of Ogre Pistols or Ogre Crossbow. Shots 4, Str 4, AP 2 (Range is dependent on which weapon is enchanted). This weapon also gains Magical Attacks and Poison Attacks (in case of Brace of Ogre Pistols, both Attack Attributes also apply to Close Combat Attacks made with it). An enchanted Ogre Crossbow loses Area Attack (1x5). Shooting Attacks made with this weapon always hit on 4+.

item.name: Wildheart
item.description: Mammoth Hunters only. One of a Kind. The bearer loses Not a Leader and must be the General. Its Special Item allowance is increased to 150 pts. Another Mammoth Hunter in the army may be the Battle Standard Bearer for 50 pts; this Battle Standard Bearer gains Scrapling Lookout when joined to Yeti units. The Core limit is reduced to "Min. 20%". The army may not include any Great Khans, Khans, Bruisers, Mercenary Veterans, Bombardiers, or Thunder Cannons. AMR

item.name: Wrestlers Belt
item.description: Models on foot only. Enchantment: Light Armour. The wearer gains +2 Armour and +1 Strength.

item.name: Yeti Furs
item.description: Enchantment: Suit of Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour. Enemy units in base contact with the wearer suffer -1 Agility.
